summary.Title: Costing team leader
summary.Presentation: Do you want to play a key role in our efforts to improve the scalability of our enterprise? Can you drive excellence in costing and productivity in a facility service organization?  <

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to play a key role in our efforts to improve the scalability of our enterprise? Can you drive excellence in costing and productivity in a facility service organization?

This is your chance to lead a skilled team to drive efficient operations towards cost leadership in the facility management market.

Leading efforts to anchor knowledge of cost estimation to ensure commitment to continuous improvements You will lead a specialized and capable team of 5 colleagues to set up a framework for costing and productivity activities in each of our Service Product lines: Cleaning, Food, Technical and Workplace services. You ensure knowledge and processes are anchored in cost estimation and productivity calculation tools that support your colleagues across functions and operations.

As our new Costing team leader, you work closely with your colleagues in Service Product lines, Commercial and Operations. You help operations and service products understand the relationship between service standards and processes and their cost – and you ensure commitment to continuous improvements. You work with team to set up process for evaluation and analysis of productivity and performance and advise on appropriate mitigation measures to optimize profitability.

You are a dedicated leader ensuring alignment of stakeholders and prioritization of your team’s efforts. As your team and the collaboration evolves, you will also work with Costing colleagues across the global ISS organization.

A true collaborator, driving different thinking and balancing stakeholders We are looking for a colleague with an educational background within finance or business and relevant experience maybe from data management, product costing, productivity, financial analysis of P&L impacts or similar. You have working proficiency in both Danish and English.

  • You explain complex matters in a non-complex way, and are a true collaborator, balancing stakeholders and working with others to achieve better outcomes.
  • You build structure and standards to support the optimal performance and productivity in business operations, also with a creative streak, driving you to think differently and explore alternative solutions.
  • You have an analytical mindset and a strong commercial understanding, and experience working with P&L fundamentals and the impact that optimizing and costing will have on a specific project.
You will become part of a talented team of highly skilled and kind colleagues In Business Transformation we are creative and ambitious. You will join a team where everyone takes responsibility for delivering the best results, and where we work together to make the most of each of our professional and personal competencies.

We offer a strong network of colleagues and great career opportunities both locally and globally and opportunities to collaborate with a variety of business leaders. We are ambitious and we work hard to make sure our colleagues at all levels in the organization receive the support and advice they need to create value for our customers.

You will become part of a responsible company that is constantly evolving and that focuses on people.


Application We look forward to receiving your application as soon as possible and no later than May 15, 2022, by uploading your cover letter and CV. We will review the applications continuously. Please contact Head of Business Transformation, Palle Holmegaard Andersen +45 2135 2879 for questions on the role.
